intro: Stenophragma, commonly known as the African star grass, is a genus of flowering plants belonging to the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its distinctive star-shaped flowers, which are typically yellow or orange in color. The plants are native to various regions in Africa and are often found in grassland and woodland habitats. They have fibrous roots and are adapted to thrive in well-drained soils. Stenophragma species are also valued for their ornamental appeal and are sometimes cultivated in gardens.
